about_the_game:
Hunt the Pale Gods is roguelike tactical deck-builder, hunt horrific monsters and use their powers against them.

Add powerful cards to your deck, loot ancient curios that break the rules of the game and discover wild synergies. Nightmarish bosses wait to test you and your deck, with unique card rewards that stack the odds in your favour. You will need it.

DEMO

  • Only first act is available, it includes the act boss fight.
  • Only 2 characters are playable.
  • New characters can not be unlocked.
  • All cards CAN be found and obtained. Though no deck will reach its true potential.
  • Some art assets are still in beta, unlikely to impact the demo experience.

APOSTLES TO THE PALE GODS


You will face five different aspects of the Pale Gods. Each aspect has unique foes, mechanics, and card rewards. Shape your deck, discover game breaking combinations, and awaken your true potential. No run is the same!

  • PRIMORDIAL: Savagery and blood magic. Call upon the primal strength surging within.
  • PROGENY: Time and space. Manipulate reality and the flow of time.
  • ABYSSAL: Wrath from the deep. Command sea and stone to crush anyone in your way.
  • UMBRAL: The dark beyond. Lurk in the shadows and become the terror in the void.
  • EYE: The cult of the Ashen Absolution. Ancient secrets and cleansing flames.

EVERY STEP COUNTS


Battles flow, standing still means defeat. Movement and positioning are critical. Dodge enemy attacks, rush in on the offense, steal the powerful altars and utilize the terrain features to your favor.

OVERWHELM AND STAGGER


Press the attack, break your foes and force them to STAGGER. Use this window to obliterate them or catch your breath. Be careful, you are just as easily staggered. Plan and control the battle!

VEILED PATH


The path ahead is uncertain. Each individual path choice matters now, it defines the next battle and the card rewards you will be offered. The future is unknown, do not waste time. Choose wisely, choose boldly!

FEATURE LIST


  • 240+ Unique cards, to unleash upon your enemies.
  • 118+ Curios, with game breaking effects.
  • 9 Characters, with their own mechanics.
  • 40+ Events, with unique choices that shape your run.
  • 13 Horrifying bosses, that stand in your way.
